body:
Hi, Chris,

Thank you so much for your help! It is really great to see it is working! Another question: Why is cooling and total thermal is missing from the output in your image attached? Is it because the HVAC system I selected that doesn't cool the building at all?



Forgive me if I am asking some silly question, since I don't know much about energy model and MEP stuff. Just doing what my boss wanted me to do and experimenting.



Thank you for your kind reply!
